name: HotDog
author: fidele007
description: A simple tweak to customize your iOS look.

3.1-beta-5: NEW: Added custom color option for SlideToUnlock text
NEW: Added position option for Date and Time
Seconds now work on status bar clock (not on Lock Screen clock)
3.2-6: Added X and Y positions for Lock screen Date|Time
Added X and Y positions for "slide to unlock" text
Added custom secondary string for "slide to unlock" text on failed Touch ID authentication
Fixed the bug where slide to unlock text revert color back to default on failed Touch ID authentication
Fixed the bug where seconds stop working after returning from passcode view on some devices
